remarks: A criterion for determining whether one topology is finer than another, based on a comparison of their bases.  Lemma 2.2 of [Munkres] p. 80. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
statement:
tgss2 $p |- ( ( B e. V /\ U. B = U. C ) -> ( ( topGen ` B ) C_ ( topGen ` C ) <-> A. x e. U. B A. y e. B ( x e. y -> E. z e. C ( x e. z /\ z C_ y ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d V x y $.
$d x y z $.
